text: A wid iumnen! Ma tekkrem ar téallit, ssirdet udmawen nnwen, ifassen nnwen alamma d ti$wmaô, sâaddit ifassen illexsen $ef iqweôôa nnwen, ssirdet ivaôen nnwen ar twelza. Ma tellam s loanaba, zzizdget. Ma tuvnem ne$ tunagem, ne$ iusa d yiwen segwen si ccicma, ne$ tennulem tilawin, ur tufim aman, ddmet akal zeddigen, sâaddit ep $ef udmawen nnwen akked ifassen nnwen. Ur Ib$a ara Öebbi a kwen Iqelleq, maca Ib$a a kwen Izzizdeg, ad awen Itim l$it iS, amar a pesnemmrem
